SearchCarrierActAbbreviatedRecord.MainSQL:
SELECT DURABLE_ID , LOAD_REP_CSTID , TRANSACTION_CODE , TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ACTDTTM , DURABLE_STATUS_CODE , EQUIPMENT_ID
, TRF_STAT_CODE , CST_LOAD_LOCATION_CODE , PORT_ID , RACK_ID , USE_FLAG
, TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDDTTM FROM TB_EGN_DURB_HIST WHERE 1=1 +Option2 +Option3 -- 바인딩 안됨 ORDER BY ACTDTTM DESC +Option1
